forecast.day_comments: Rain and snow, mainly before 4pm.  High near 35. Wind chill values between 25 and 30. West wind around 9 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 90%. Total daytime snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.
forecast.night_comments: Rain, possibly mixed with snow, becoming all rain after 7pm.  Low around 32. Wind chill values between 24 and 29. West wind around 11 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 100%. Little or no snow accumulation expected.
